cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 160 miles SE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: Accelerating northeast, paralleling the U.S. East Coast and expected to cross Nova Scotia and Newfoundland before moving into the North Atlantic

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for Prince Edward Island and Magdalen Islands; Tropical Storm Watch none for U.S. coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Lower East Pubnico to Brule (Nova Scotia) and Indian Harbour to Hawke's Bay (Newfoundland); Tropical Storm Warning Woods Hole MA to Eastport ME and portions of Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern Massachusetts, Downeast Maine, Nova Scotia, Gulf of St. Lawrence, Newfoundland
weather_observation.wind: Breezy with occasional gusts, but sustained tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely (â‰¤3% chance).
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor, if any; mainly long-period swells rather than surge.
weather_observation.rainfall: Passing showers possible, total generally less than 1 inch.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along the New Jersey shore through the weekend.
